mapper.select: select * from users where username = #{username} or phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: insert into users (username, phone, password, nickname, avatar, gender, birthday, points, vip_level, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{username}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{points}, #{vipLevel}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
